name: SlaughterSphere
description:
WELCOME TO THE SLAUGHTERSPHERE!

This is the universe's premier arena for CARNAGE AND MAYHEM!  As a combatant, you'll be required to take energy weapons from the walls of the sphere, which decay as you land successful hits.  The catch is that each weapon you pick up does damage equal to its damage value when you pick it up.  To win in this arena, you have to pay with BLOOD!

This game was made in 3 days as part of Ludum Dare 44

Standard WASD controls, left click to attack
